name: Softique Commerce
shortBio: High-performance Shopify solutions: theme development, data migration, Shopify Plus, custom apps, integrations, and headless commerce.
businessDescription: Softique Commerce delivers high-performance Shopify solutions, including theme development, data migration, Shopify Plus, custom apps, integrations, and headless commerce—helping brands scale, optimize, and grow faster.

partner.description: Partners are tiered based on multiple factors, including their history of experience and proven success on Shopify.

ctaStrip.title: Ready to scale your Shopify store?
ctaStrip.subtitle: Share your goals and we’ll reply with a clear plan, timeline, and next steps.

featuredWork.name: Ion8
featuredWork.summary: Shopify work focused on a smooth buying experience, storefront polish, and scalable merchandising.

featuredWork.name: Any Sharp
featuredWork.summary: Ecommerce experience improvements and Shopify enhancements for growth.

featuredWork.name: Takdhum
featuredWork.summary: Shopify storefront setup and theme customization for a product-led brand.

outcomes.label: delivery
outcomes.detail: Clear scope, milestones, and reliable QA.

outcomes.label: focused
outcomes.detail: UX improvements that help conversion and retention.

services.title: Store build or redesign
services.description: High-performance Shopify storefronts with clean UX and maintainable theme architecture.
bullets: Performance, Core Web Vitals, and SEO-ready structure

services.title: Store migration & data migration
services.description: Safe migrations with minimal downtime and clean data for a smooth relaunch.

services.title: Custom apps & integrations
services.description: Shopify apps, integrations, and automation to streamline operations and unlock new features.

services.title: Shopify Plus
services.description: Plus-ready implementation support for teams that need scale and reliability.

services.title: POS setup and migration
services.description: Retail POS setup, migration support, and store operations enablement.

services.title: Headless commerce
services.description: Modern storefronts for teams that need flexibility and speed.

caseStudies.title: High-converting fashion storefront
caseStudies.summary: A clean, mobile-first theme rebuild with faster performance and better merchandising.

caseStudies.title: Operations automation app
caseStudies.summary: An embedded app that streamlined order workflows and reduced manual support work.

caseStudies.title: Speed & SEO optimization sprint
caseStudies.summary: A targeted improvement pass focused on Core Web Vitals, images, and theme code quality.

engagementModels.title: Fixed-scope project
engagementModels.description: Best for a theme build, a feature set, or a specific optimization sprint.

engagementModels.title: Monthly retainer
engagementModels.description: Best for continuous improvements, experiments, and ongoing Shopify support.

engagementModels.title: App build (MVP → v1)
engagementModels.description: Best for turning a workflow into an embedded Shopify app with a stable roadmap.

faqs.q: Do you work with existing Shopify themes?
faqs.a: Yes. We can customize your current theme, build new sections, fix bugs, and improve performance without disrupting operations.
Yes. We build embedded admin apps and custom integrations. Tell us your workflow and we’ll propose the simplest reliable solution.

faqs.q: Do you handle Shopify Plus projects?
faqs.a: Yes. We support Shopify Plus builds and improvements with a performance and reliability focus.
Yes. We handle store and data migrations to Shopify with careful planning, QA, and SEO considerations.
Send a short message with your store link and goals. We’ll respond with recommended next steps, timeline, and an estimate.
